main module¶

Main module for the app

main.main()[source]¶

Populates the front page with all the recent and future issues. If the user is logged in, only his issues ares shown. If the database is emtpy, the cronjob function populates with all the entries from the Panini Store.

Returns:renders the main page with the query results
main.user_loader(id)[source]¶
Parameters:id – user id
Returns:user database object
